title: NotebookLM Plus is now available in the Google One AI Premium subscription.
description: NotebookLM is a research and thinking companion designed to help you make the most of your information. You can upload material, summarize it, ask questions and transfor…
author: Vikas KansalGroup Product ManagerGoogle One
excerpt: NotebookLM is a research and thinking companion designed to help you make the most of your information. You can upload material, summarize it, ask questions and transform it into something engaging, like a podcast-style audio discussion. NotebookLM can help you ace a career certification, generate ideas or synthesize data for a project.Starting today, we’re adding NotebookLM Plus to the Google One AI Premium plan, a version with higher usage limits and premium features for even more customized research. This adds on to existing plan benefits like Gemini Advanced, Gemini in Gmail, Docs and more, plus 2 TB of storage — more value for the same price.To make the Google One AI Premium plan more affordable for students, we’re rolling out a new 50% student discount. For 12 months, U.S. students 18 and older can get an AI Premium plan for their personal Google account at $9.99/month. This can help them work with more course materials, create custom study experts using Gemini Advanced, save time crafting emails and more.You can verify your eligibility and sign up for the discount on our website, or start a one-month trial to try out the best of Google AI.

html:
NotebookLM is a research and thinking companion designed to help you make the most of your information. You can upload material, summarize it, ask questions and transform it into something engaging, like a podcast-style audio discussion. NotebookLM can help you ace a career certification, generate ideas or synthesize data for a project.

Starting today, we’re adding NotebookLM Plus to the Google One AI Premium plan, a version with higher usage limits and premium features for even more customized research. This adds on to existing plan benefits like Gemini Advanced, Gemini in Gmail, Docs and more, plus 2 TB of storage — more value for the same price.

To make the Google One AI Premium plan more affordable for students, we’re rolling out a new 50% student discount. For 12 months, U.S. students 18 and older can get an AI Premium plan for their personal Google account at $9.99/month. This can help them work with more course materials, create custom study experts using Gemini Advanced, save time crafting emails and more.

You can verify your eligibility and sign up for the discount on our website, or start a one-month trial to try out the best of Google AI.
